page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My mum and my sister play tennis while me and my dad go train spotting. I have been train spotting ever since I was five. My sister has won a lot of trophies because she is a good tennis player. I have got four people in my family and I have got two pets, a tortoise and a hamster. My favourite occupation is train spotting. I like living in Hinckley. My favourite pop group is the Thompson Twins. I am nine years old. I leave the house to go to school and to go to my nanny's and to play with my friends. My house is twelve years old. If I had a chance to change the world I would get rid of school and I would make everything you buy free. My favourite food is chicken. My family like playing cricket together. My dad works at Fludes and my mum works at St. Mary's school.
